# Let's Get Some Info(graphics)
```{r}
gender_demographics %>%
  mutate(
    perc_female = ifelse(perc_female >= 0.5, 1, 0)
  ) %>%
  count(perc_female)
hist(gender_demographics$perc_female)
gender_demographics %>%
  count(born_in_binary)
hist(gender_demographics$born_in_binary)
gender_demographics %>%
  count(white_or_not)
hist(gender_demographics$white_or_not)
gender_demographics %>%
  count(Functie.22)
hist(gender_demographics$functie)
gender_demographics %>%
  count(hoogleraar)
hist(gender_demographics$hoogleraar)
```
